place.name: BATHEALTON
place.gazetteerText: BATHEALTON, a parish in Wellington district, Somerset; near the Western canal, 4½ miles WNW of Wellington r. station, and 5½ from Wellington. It has a post office under Wellington, Somerset. Acres, 941. Real property, £1,481. Pop., 135. Houses, 26. The property is divided among a few. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £226.* Patron, the Rev. E. Webber. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
